French: Il y a 30 minutes que je suis en retard.
English: I have been late for 30 minutes.
I was away for two weeks.

French: Il restera 10 minutes avant que la rencontre ne commence.
English: There will be 10 minutes before the meeting starts.

French: Nous devons attendre un mois avant de reprendre les leçons.
English: We have to wait a month before we can resume our lessons.

French: J'ai terminé mon travail hier soir à minuit.
English: I finished my work last night at midnight.

French: Il y aura 5 minutes avant que la prochaine pause ne finisse.
English: There will be 5 minutes before the next break ends.

French: J'ai passé un week-end à Paris il y a 2 ans.
English: I spent a weekend in Paris 2 years ago.

French: Nous devons attendre 3 semaines avant de découvrir les résultats.
English: We have to wait 3 weeks before we can find out the results.
